name: SQL
description: The SQL library provides simplified database operations with automatic table creation, upsert functionality, and common CRUD operations. It works with oxmysql and handles common database patterns used in FiveM development.

serverFunctions.name: Create
serverFunctions.description: Creates a table with the specified columns if it doesn't already exist. Uses CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS syntax.

parameters.name: tableName
parameters.description: Name of the table to create

parameters.name: columns
parameters.description: Array of column definitions with 'name' and 'type' properties

serverFunctions.name: InsertOrUpdate
serverFunctions.description: Inserts a new record or updates an existing one if a duplicate key is found. Uses INSERT ... ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE syntax.

parameters.name: tableName
parameters.description: Name of the table to insert/update

parameters.name: data
parameters.description: Key-value pairs representing column names and values

serverFunctions.example:
local playerData = {
    identifier = "steam:110000103fa6fc1",
    name = "John Doe",
    money = 5000
}

SQL.InsertOrUpdate("players", playerData)
print("Player data saved successfully")

-- Update existing player
playerData.money = 7500
SQL.InsertOrUpdate("players", playerData)
print("Player money updated")

serverFunctions.name: Get
serverFunctions.description: Retrieves records from a table based on a WHERE condition.

parameters.name: tableName
parameters.description: Name of the table to query

parameters.name: where
parameters.description: WHERE clause condition (without the WHERE keyword)

returns.description: Array of records matching the condition

serverFunctions.example:
-- Get specific player
local result = SQL.Get("players", "identifier = 'steam:110000103fa6fc1'")
if #result > 0 then
    local player = result[1]
    print("Player name: " .. player.name)
    print("Player money: " .. player.money)
end

-- Get players with money > 1000
local richPlayers = SQL.Get("players", "money > 1000")
print("Found " .. #richPlayers .. " rich players")

serverFunctions.name: GetAll
serverFunctions.description: Retrieves all records from a table without any filtering.

parameters.name: tableName
parameters.description: Name of the table to query

returns.description: Array of all records in the table

serverFunctions.example:
local allPlayers = SQL.GetAll("players")
print("Total players in database: " .. #allPlayers)

for i, player in ipairs(allPlayers) do
    print(string.format("%d. %s - $%d", i, player.name, player.money))
end

serverFunctions.name: Delete
serverFunctions.description: Deletes records from a table based on a WHERE condition.

parameters.name: tableName
parameters.description: Name of the table to delete from

parameters.name: where
parameters.description: WHERE clause condition (without the WHERE keyword)

serverFunctions.example:
-- Delete specific player
SQL.Delete("players", "identifier = 'steam:110000103fa6fc1'")
print("Player deleted from database")

-- Delete inactive players (example condition)
SQL.Delete("players", "last_login < DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 30 DAY)")
print("Inactive players cleaned up")
